explains: adv. 用化学；以化学方法

sentences.en: Biscuits and crackers are chemically leavened.
sentences.cn: 饼干和脆饼干是用化学方法发酵的。

sentences.en: This addition of a chemically precipitated substance into pore spaces is termed "permineralization".
sentences.cn: 这种化学沉淀物质进入孔隙的过程被称为“完全矿化”。

sentences.en: But when we analyze these cells chemically, we find something very interesting, a chemical in them, an enzyme called telomerase.
sentences.cn: 但当我们用化学方法分析这些细胞时，我们发现了一些非常有趣的东西，其中有一种化学物质，是一种叫做端粒酶的酶。
